short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes YouTube videos embedded in threads lightweight to avoid browser hangs on threads with large numbers of videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances the Something Awful Forums so that inlined YouTube videos are loaded in a more lightweight way, so that the browser doesn't hang when large numbers are on a page.

New in version 0.4 - Embedded YouTube videos can now be fullscreened!
